# French


### Text: Haha, tu n'y arriveras jamais... this old french men thinks he can troll us. He sends messages and messages again. Show him that you are awesome by breaking the message. Hint: Flag content should be lowercase. 

&nbsp;

Score: 10

Link: https://github.com/SecurityValley/PublicCTFChallenges/tree/master/crypto/weird_but_old

---
 ## Writeup

Like the last set of Crypto challenges we are given a string of characters.

```

```

Unlike the previous text, this is not a *Caesar Cipher* or *Substitution Cipher*. Unfortunately I do not speak french, but I do know of the *Vigenere Cipher* which was created by a French cryptographer. The *Vigenere Cipher* rotates characters depending on their location in a key. By reversing this process I was left with the following text. I used the following website to reverse the cipher, https://www.dcode.fr/vigenere-cipher.

```

```

## Flag: SecVal{anakinskywalker}
